children.description: Content rendered inside the SimpleList item (React component or element)

className.description: Additional classes added to the SimpleList <li>

component.description: Component type of the SimpleList item

componentClassName.description: Additional classes added to the SimpleList <a> or <button>

componentProps.description: Additional props added to the SimpleList <a> or <button> (Type: any)

isActive.description: Indicates if the link is current/highlighted

itemId.description: id for the item. (Type: number | string)

onClick.description: OnClick callback for the SimpleList item (Type: (event: React.MouseEvent | React.ChangeEvent) => void)
